entry.title: TryHackMe: Linux Privilege Escalation
entry.summary:
https://tryhackme.com/room/linprivesc
Enumeration Commands that can be used to collect information about a Linux system.
Hostname
karen@wade7363:/$ hostname wade****
Linux kernel version karen@wade7363:/$ uname -a Linux wade7363 3.**.*-**-******* #46-Ubuntu GNU/Linux
karen@wade7363:/$ cat /proc/version Linux version 3.**.*-**-******* (buildd@panlong) -Ubuntu SMP Thu Apr 10 19:11:08 UTC 20...
